main event: A woman and her mother observed a bright, brilliant white object in the sky over Beach Haven, New Jersey on August 17, 1967.
interesting points: The object appeared suddenly in the northeast, about one or two miles over the Little Egg Inlet, and was the size of a golf ball.
The object moved parallel to the earth towards the east, then suddenly shot straight up into the clouds and out of sight.
The witness looked at the object through binoculars and saw that it had a 'super-structure in the shape of a cigar' with what looked like window outlines.

On August 28, 1967, the witness and her mother saw another UFO that appeared in the south, moved downward towards the southeast, and then shot straight up and moved into the northeast at a 'fantastic rate of speed'.
The witness called the Coast Guard, State Police, and a local tourism board to report the sightings, but was unable to get a clear identification of the objects.
sighted object: a brilliant white, cigar-shaped object with window outlines
